// PURPOSE: Guarantees consistent WFO results - NEVER change during BT
// SAFETY: For backtesting only - does NOT perform live trading
// STATIC_PAIRS: Fixed pairlist for all MATRIX backtests
maintenance_notes: Add new pairs only at the end of the list
NEVER change the ordering of existing pairs
Apply changes only outside active WFO backtests
Document reason for changes in the commit message
For live trading, use a dynamic pairlist in the main config
